Node.gloss: to lie down with one's fathers > to rest with one's ancestors
Node.definition: literally: to lie down with one's fathers; hence: = process by which a human being dies and so shares the fate and destination of his/her ancestors; ≈ only said of people in positions demanding respect, such as patriarchs and kings
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= indirect male progenitor

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect
= indirect male progenitor
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of king Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט)
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Asa (אָסָא) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (870/69 848)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= object given to someone else
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= objects of an extraordinary quality and high value

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= construction or set of constructions in the shape of walls, ramparts, and towers; ► erected in order to make a town better defendable against attack or siege

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

Node.gloss: to summon one's strength|to strengthen one's position|to show one's strength|to make an effort
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities rally and show their physical, political, or military strength
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= state in which a countable entity is eight in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to make a covenant|to make a treaty
Node.definition: literally: to cut (a covenant); hence: = action by which two or more parties make a solemn agreement, accompanied by stipulations, blessings, and curses
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: all the days; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= causative action by which humans or deities place (other) humans in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object

literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
= town; ◄ located in the foothills (שְׁפֵלָה) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= indirect male progenitor

= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface

= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= man; ◄ from Tishbe (תִּשְׁבִּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of Ahab (אַחְאָב)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat

= state in which an event has a high intensity
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which humans lack physical strength, ◄ caused by sickness or injury

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury
literally: days upon days; hence, probably: = process by which a prolonged period of time elapses
literally: days upon days; hence, probably: = process by which a prolonged period of time elapses
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's inactivity to end so that he comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= inhabitant of Arabia (עֲרַב)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= member of the ethnic group ◄ that is regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans find their way by breaking through all obstacles that keep them from moving forward
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= set of particles marking an object or event as a subset of a larger group which has been singled out from among the rest
= man, also known as Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָה) ◄ son of Joram (יֹורָם) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) 843
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

Node.gloss: in due time|in the course of time
Node.definition: literally: to days from days; exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a reference to the time after an unspecified amount of time had elapsed

Node.gloss: in due time|in the course of time
Node.definition: literally: to days from days; exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a reference to the time after an unspecified amount of time had elapsed
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
literally: days; hence: = a period of a full year
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion
= state in which humans are lacking physical strength, ◄ as a result of sickness or injury
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= state in which humans lack physical strength; ◄ caused by sickness or injury
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= indirect male progenitor
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= state in which a countable entity is eight in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= process by which someone is going to die, described as a movement in one way only
= human or deity that is the object of someone else's desire

= to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
